summary: Did it ever bother you that even though there are nine places marked on the map in Annals of the Dragonguard,those  only one actually exists? This mod adds new Akaviri ruins to the places marked on the map.
descriptionHtml:
[img] http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/35503-1-1367452961.gif [/img]
[img] http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/35503-2-1367453503.gif [/img]

Did it ever bother you that even though there are nine places marked on the map in Annals of the Dragonguard,those  only one actually exists? This mod adds new Akaviri ruins to the places marked on the map.

[img] http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/35503-1-1367454888.gif [/img]
Features:
New Locations
New Weapons
New Light Armor
New Artifacts
New Blessing
New potions
New enemys
New Special Forge

[img] http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/35503-1-1367454888.gif [/img]
Stats:
Light Blades Armor:
Armor Rating-42
Weight-15
Armor Type-Light

Light Blades Boots:
Armor Rating-12
Weight-5
Armor Type-Light

Light Blades Gauntlets:
Armor Rating-12
Weight-4
Armor Type-Light

Light Blades Helmet:
Armor Rating-16
Weight-6
Armor Type-Light

Akaviri DaiKatana:
Damage-20
Weight-17
Weapon Type-Greatsword

Akaviri Battle Fan:
Damage-7
Weight-1.5
Weapon Type-Dagger

Akaviri Scythe:
Damage-22
Weight-21
Weapon Type-Battle Axe

Akaviri Pollaxe:
Damage-21
Weight-17
Weapon Type-Greatsword

[img] http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/35503-1-1367454888.gif [/img]
Update Log:
V1: Initial release
V2: Fixed Improving recipes

[img] http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/35503-1-1367454888.gif [/img]
Locations:
1- Gray stone temple (Closest to Bucca\'s Leap Redoubt)
2- Snow Fell Outpost (Closest to Volunruud)
3- Unnamed (Closest to North Brittleshin Pass/Sucunda\'s Kiss)
4- Unnamed (Closest to Angi\'s Camp)
5- Lost Voice Temple (Closest to Irkngthand/Fellglow Keep)
6- Unnamed (Closest to Fort Kastav)
7- High Bell Tower (Closest to Boulderfall Cave)
8- Unnamed  (Closest to Riften)

[img] http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/35503-1-1367454888.gif [/img]
Requirements: Latest Version of Skyrim

Mod Conflicts/Bugs: None reported 

Notes: This mod is entirely lore friendly and made for the sake of lore enchancement. If you have any comments, questions, concers, or ideas feel free to leave a comment. I will also accept pictures submited by users.

Also check out my new Blessings of the Madgod Mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38348/?
author: D0VAK11N
